definition: lit. to change something rotten into something magical (idiom)
pinyin: hua4 fu3 xiu3 wei2 shen2 qi2

definition: Pokémon or Pocket Monsters, popular Japanese video game, anime and manga

sentences.english: The crown is the source of oxygen, worker of the magic of photosynthesis.
sentences.chinese: 树冠是氧的来源，是神奇光合作用的制造者。

sentences.english: Wall Street gains after a smaller-than-expected number of jobs lost and a surprise drop in the unemployment rate.
sentences.chinese: 小于预期的失业数和失业率的神奇下跌使美股上涨。

sentences.english: The Four Wonders of the Huangshan Mountain are absolutely breathtaking. I felt as if I had been in a different world.
sentences.chinese: 黄山的四绝真神奇，我感觉好像置身于一个世外桃源。

sentences.english: Gorged with power, I grew blind to Pokemon being alive.
sentences.chinese: 因贪嗜权力，竟令小生对神奇宝贝之存活盲目不见。

sentences.english: Must be a kind of mysterious drug.
sentences.chinese: 一定是一种很神奇的药。

sentences.english: Grassland has the magical power to make tings simple.
sentences.chinese: 草原有着神奇的化繁为简的能力。

sentences.english: The rhino, which is almost extinct, with its extraordinary horns and bad temper.
sentences.chinese: 犀牛，几乎灭绝的物种，有着神奇的犀角和暴脾气。

sentences.english: Mix that fantasy dreamscape sketch with the steampunk idea.
sentences.chinese: 把那个神奇的梦境图和蒸气朋克揉在一起。

sentences.english: The wizardly behavior of SAR is to absorb large amount of water and keep water from evaporation.
sentences.chinese: 其神奇特性在于可吸收大量的水并阻止水分蒸发。

sentences.english: Sometimes people think there is something magic about sensorial math materials.
sentences.chinese: 有时人们认为数学教具是神奇的事物。

sentences.english: Dr. Kaku uses amazing technologies to create working designs for our sci-fi future.
sentences.chinese: 加来博士用神奇科技替科幻未来创造工艺设计。

sentences.english: It certainly woudl be a a amazing and most beautiful experience to be looking down at earth from space! !
sentences.chinese: 从太空往下看，肯定很神奇，肯定是最美好的经历。

sentences.english: But, boy, she had a thousand years of magic stored in her head.
sentences.chinese: 但是，小崽子，在她的脑子里藏有千年的神奇故事。

sentences.english: Wringting of light assaut the darkness, more prodigious thanmeteors .
sentences.chinese: 光明的文字划过黑暗，比流星更为神奇。

sentences.english: Three years later, it magically reappeared at Dalian.
sentences.chinese: 但三年后，它却神奇地重新出现在了大连。

definition: lit. to change something rotten into something magical (idiom)
pinyin: hua4 fu3 xiu3 wei2 shen2 qi2

definition: to be amazed/to be surprised/to wonder
